interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Review Date: 2020/10/20 Store: Bouquet Garni Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} Review Text: Since COVID, finding soap and shower gels isn't the easiest task. Not sure if people are drinking gels in the shower or just really self-conscious about cleanliness. Either way, I often find myself ordering products online. The selection at physical stores is iffy. Ran across this product and decided to give it a try. After all, the packaging is attractive. If anything it will look nice in a guest bathroom IF I ever have guests at my house again.

First, the size is great. Almost 18 ounces! Popular brands offer a hand pump with 7.5 oz. Bouquet Garni is double the size. That's a good thing. Less I've gotta get out. I'm not crazy about the White Musk smell. It's a floral scent. I'm more of a woodsy, fruity scent. On the other hand, my mother loves this scent. So, while I planned to use this as a shower gel, I've decided to use it in the guest bath. Mom can enjoy the rich lather every time she washes her hands.

Made in Korea. I'm not sure of the ingredients because the back label is foreign. I'm sure the website offers ingredients if one must know. Review Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower Gel Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MD Complete Bright & Healthy Vitamin C+ Vitalizing Face Serum| with Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Herbal Extracts | Potent Antioxidant Protection, Nourishes, Brightens and Evens Skin 0.5 fl oz MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson {'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone, Sensitive', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.05 x 1.63 x 3.75 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005573'} Not my favorite Vit C serum. While it supplies major moisture, my skin did not appreciate the thickness. When I woke up the first morning after using my face felt greasy. It didn't appear to have that sheer feeling of a clean moisturizer. Afterward, I applied the serum every other night. Four days later, I had breakouts on my nose. I have combination skin. This didn't work well for me, but I can see this working for those with severely dry skin. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type:** Prefers products catering to sensitive and acne-prone skin with combination characteristics.
- **Product Preference:** Values lightweight formulations, particularly serums, that provide hydration without greasy residue. Recently shown interest in body wash with a focus on mild cleansing properties.
- **Effectiveness:** Prioritizes products that deliver hydration without causing breakouts or heaviness on the skin, demonstrating awareness of ingredient impact.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Responds positively to soothing scents like aloe, yet has expressed a preference for woodsy or fruity fragrances over floral ones, which indicates a nuanced approach to sensory experiences in skincare.
- **Usage Patterns:** Consistent user who may adjust product use based on skin reactions or scent preferences, reflecting attentiveness to both ingredients and personal preferences.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Evaluates products pragmatically based on performance and suitability for individual needs, recently emphasizing the importance of packaging and size, alongside product quality.

The user appears to seek effective skincare solutions that align with their combination skin's sensitivities while remaining open to experimenting with formulations. Their recent exploration in body wash suggests a willingness to enhance their routine with complementary products, while still maintaining a focus on preferred ingredient profiles.
